sourcesContent:
<button *ngIf="!value" class="w-full h-full text-6xl bg-[#a1f1f7fd] hover:bg-[#b6f059be] text-white border-none">{{value}}</button>
<button *ngIf="value =='X'" class="w-full h-full text-6xl bg-gradient-to-t from-[#c4dfd9] via-[#59f0e3be] to-[#336d77f3] text-white border-none">{{value}}</button>
<button *ngIf="value =='O'" class="w-full h-full text-6xl bg-gradient-to-b from-[#c4dfd9] via-[#5989f0be] to-[#333877f3] text-white border-none">{{value}}</button>
